<<<<<<< HEAD
A letter from Major-General Kirk in Ireland to his friend in London. From His Majesties camp near Dublin, July the 4th. 1690. Kirke, Percy, 1646?-1691.
1 sheet (1 p.)
Printed for J. M. in Little-Brittain, [London] : 1690.
Place of publication from Wing. Imperfect; cropped with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge.
=======

Printed for J. M. in Little-Brittain, [London] : 1690.
Place of publication from Wing. Imperfect; cropped with some loss of text. Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library, Cambridge.
